But Mike Pence will need more. The folks I've heard, the names I've seen, are the leaders of the social conservative movement, said GOP strategist Scott Reed, who managed Bob Dole 's presidential campaign in 1996.`` And that is a strong base from which to start. But it isn't going to get you to the finish line.

on Sunday. Media reports during Egypt's political unrest had quoted Zahi Hawass as saying that looters damaged two mummies, but in a BBC interview on Sunday he said that this was not the case. They were not mummies, there were two skulls taken outside from the CT scan machine. Everything will go back to normal at Cairo Museum today, said Zahi Hawass , head of Egypt's antiquities authority since 2002. He was made a cabinet minister last week. Andy Coulson 's departure weakens David Cameron and chancellor George Osborne , who jointly appointed Andy Coulson and have staunchly- and sometimes testily- defended him in public and private. George Osborne described Andy Coulson as an incredibly talented, dedicated and patriotic servant of this country . David Cameron said he was saddened by his departure, adding he felt his communications director was`` being punished twice for the same offence.'' The PM said:`` This is all about

I'd be amazed if they didn't discuss Andy Coulson , said a source with some knowledge of the meeting.
